I'm an an external Faculty Member at the [Srishti Manipal Institute of Art, Design, and Technology (SMI)](https://srishtimanipalinstitute.in), in Bangalore, INDIA. I am passionate about working on R,
Data Visualization, Complexity Science, and Creative Thinking and
Problem Solving with TRIZ. On this website, I share my course materials
and methods. I also blog about TRIZ and Data Science on occasion.

To get started, you can check out my courses on this website. 

My other teaching websites are:\
- [Foundation Courses at Srishti](https://arvindvenkatadri.com)\
- [Teaching R to Artists and Designers](https://r-for-artists.netlify.app)\
- [Using AI in R](https://ai-in-r.netlify.app)\

My student portfolios are here:\
